QuestData.Title: Priestess of the Moon
QuestData.Description: Perhaps you'd be willing to aid us in further pursuing the corruption haunting Shadowglen.$B$BDentaria Silverglade, Priestess of the Moon, has offered to aid us. You should find her between the two pools just north of our great tree. Circle around the tree to reach her and offer her any help that you can, young $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Dentaria Silverglade between the two pools in the center of Shadowglen.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good that you've come. It seems your training progresses quickly.
